document_title: Vocal cord paralysis: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_name: liet-day-thanh-quan.json_9_10. How to care for people with vocal cord paralysis
subsection_content:
In addition to the patient's efforts, caregivers also play an important role in the recovery process from vocal cord paralysis.
Remind patients to practice speech: regularly encourage patients to practice speech as prescribed by the doctor to improve breathing and speaking ability.; Remind patients to practice speech: regularly encourage patients to practice speech as prescribed by the doctor to improve breathing and speaking ability.
Encourage the patient's spirit: words of encouragement are very useful for the recovery process, helping the patient feel secure as well as motivated to treat the disease.; Encourage the patient's spirit: words of encouragement are very useful for the recovery process, helping the patient feel secure and motivated to treat the disease.
